Title: Episode 4
Plot: A violent incident raises questions about Robin?s future with the local police, but she won?t let go of the case. She locates a friend of Tui?s who refuses to speak a word to anyone. He is accused of disrespect, but Robin believes there are deeper motives at play. His silence may hold a clue to Tui?s disappearance and she?s determined to earn his trust.
